english.segment1: Jesus, I pray. Take all my mistakes. Throw them away. Destroy them for my sake
english.segment2: Jesus, I call out 'cause I'm sorry. Because I fall so short of your glory. To the best of my ability. I'm practicing humility. And I lay myself before. 'Cause less is more
english.segment3: All that I have. I lay before. With my pride on the floor. Cause to you less is more. All that I have. I lay before. With my pride on the floor. Cause to you less is more
english.segment4: I pour out myself. All that I am. You love me so much. That you fill me again. And may these words on my heart, on my lips. Somehow mean so much more than this
english.segment5: Jesus, I pray. Know what I'm trying to say
english.segment6: All that I have. I lay before. With my pride on the floor. 'Cause to you less is more. All that I have. I lay before. With my pride on the floor. Cause to you less is more
english.segment7: I pour out myself, before you were Lord. I hold nothing back, 'cause to you less is more. And may these words on my heart on my lips, Somehow mean so much more than this
english.segment8: Jesus, I pray. Just know what I'm tryin' to say
english.segment9: Jesus, I plead. Please purify me. Make my heart clean. Drench me with your mercy. Jesus, I pray. I love you, I need you. For the rest of my days. I swear I will seek you. To the best of my ability. I'm practicing humility. And I lay myself before. 'Cause less is more.
